message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I could come down a bit to $100.  I believe this product will really benefit you and it's a fair price for the value it provides.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
